hotels.description: Experience the perfect blend of comfort and convenience at this Novotel gem, located in the heart of Pangkalpinang. Savour local delicacies at the onsite restaurant-The Square - or enjoy a refreshing dip in the shimmering outdoor pool. Venture out to explore the city's vibrant markets and historic tin mines or take a short drive to the mesmerising Pemali Hot Springs. Just 15 minutes from Depati Amir Airport, this modern retreat is your gateway to relaxation and adventure, with the tropical white sands of Pasir Padi Beach just a short drive away.
